input.sentences: a day in the park is a great way to spend a lazy sunday .
we relax on the bench as grandma arrives .
sand games are fun | let 's get started !
frisbee is a picnic favorite of ours .
looking fine and catching some rays after flinging the frisbee far .
output.sentences: There was a family reunion at the park today.
Some of the family were sitting at the picnic table enjoying each others company.
Others were playing games in the sand.
There were some men in some kind of kilts playing ball in the sand.
With others sitting in the sand watching them play.
